column4: Can I take a snapshot of the desktop when I point to a system menu item?
I think ive seen it done with some tools that have a 'delay setting' that can wait a few sec then take a snap shot.  but i cant recall the name of the tools.
depends on how far down the list windows is.. Or you can use the 'saved' feature of grub2 and select windows  by 'name'
look at where it mentions --> GRUB_DEFAULT=saved
